lead_paragraph: Notre Dame has hired Mike Elko as its defensive coordinator, hoping he can turn around a unit that struggled at the beginning of last season and was blamed in part for a down year for the Fighting Irish.

headline.print_headline: Notre Dame Hires Wake Forest's Elko as Defensive Coordinator
headline.main: Notre Dame Hires Wake Forest's Elko as Defensive Coordinator
